data.lyric:
[ti:What Would Meek Do? (Clean)]
[ar:Pusha T/Kanye West]
[al:DAYTONA (Clean)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:01.15]What Would Meek Do? (Explicit) - Pusha T/Kanye West (坎耶·韦斯特)
[00:02.87]Producer：Kanye West
[00:04.01]Kanye West：
[00:04.66]
[00:12.19]Talkin' Push how do you respond
[00:14.32]Pusha T：
[00:15.00]I'm top five and all of them Dylan
[00:16.96]
[00:17.89]I am the hope the d**e dealers won
[00:20.16]
[00:20.81]Price and the quote the d**e dealers want
[00:22.90]
[00:24.04]Feds takin' pictures like it's GQ GQ
[00:26.94]This Avianne collarbone is see-through
[00:28.87]
[00:29.86]Angel on my shoulder what should we do we do
[00:32.73]Devil on the other what would Meek do
[00:34.72]
[00:35.47]Pop a wheelie tell the judge to Akinyele
[00:37.64]
[00:38.30]Middle fingers out the Ghost screamin' Makaveli come with me
[00:41.63]Hail Mary the scale fairy
[00:43.44]
[00:43.95]Two sides to every coin so we bail ready bail ready
[00:46.88]
[00:47.87]How do you respond
[00:48.88]
[00:50.25]I let the monies and the fools talk
[00:52.09]
[00:53.18]I let the jewels and the hues talk
[00:54.98]
[00:55.80]Watch face came with a fuse box fuse box
[00:58.51]
[00:59.24]Chanel's on ya
[01:00.10]
[01:00.86]The coupe is 320 the roof's hit or miss
[01:03.29]
[01:03.83]Murder on the highway the news is at six
[01:06.70]See I did it my way the proof's in the bricks
[01:09.29]
[01:10.08]Eghck Smell it through the Tupperware Tupperware
[01:12.81]
[01:13.33]Two can get you four like a double dare woo
[01:15.67]
[01:16.41]I'm the king of the oven-ware oven-ware
[01:18.82]You can piece the whole puzzle here
[01:20.28]
[01:21.14]Talkin' 'Ye how do you respond
[01:23.65]Kanye West：
[01:24.54]Whoop scoop
[01:25.81]
[01:27.38]Whoop Whoopty-whoop
[01:29.31]
[01:30.24]Am I too complex for ComplexCon
[01:32.22]
[01:33.15]Everything Ye say cause a new debate
[01:35.37]
[01:35.88]You see he been out of touch he cannot relate
[01:38.11]
[01:38.68]His hallway too long too bad
[01:41.23]
[01:41.76]Got a surrogate his kid get two dads
[01:44.05]
[01:44.73]I be thinkin' what would 2Pac do
[01:47.00]
[01:47.63]You be thinkin' what New Kids on the Block do
[01:50.31]If you ain't drivin' while Black do they stop you
[01:53.16]Will MAGA hats let me slide like a drive-thru
[01:55.67]
[01:56.44]That phone call from Ricky still hazy
[01:58.24]
[01:59.28]When heaven got an angel named Avery
[02:01.28]
[02:02.20]You gotta watch who you callin' crazy
[02:04.25]
[02:05.00]Yeezy the newest billion-dollar baby
[02:07.30]It won't feel right 'til I feel like Phil Knight
[02:10.17]Goin' for six rings like what Phil told Mike
[02:13.02]Seven pill nights you know what that feel like
[02:15.77]No more hidin' the scars I show 'em like Seal right
[02:18.44]
[02:20.47]How do you respond
data.trans:
[ti:What Would Meek Do? (Clean)]
[ar:Pusha T/Kanye West]
[al:DAYTONA (Clean)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:01.15]//
[00:02.87]//
[00:04.01]//
[00:04.66]
[00:12.19]他们在说你坏话 Pusha T 你打算怎么回应
[00:14.32]//
[00:15.00]我排名前五 其他人都是迪兰那种自大狂
[00:16.96]
[00:17.89]我就是众人的希望 我干着**贩卖的活儿 却成了赢家
[00:20.16]
[00:20.81]价钱和报价 **贩子想要什么有什么
[00:22.90]
[00:24.04]警察就像GQ杂志一样拍着照
[00:26.94]我脖子上的Avianne钻石项链亮晶晶的
[00:28.87]
[00:29.86]天使在我肩上 我们该怎么做
[00:32.73]恶魔在另一个肩上 Meek会怎么做
[00:34.72]
[00:35.47]吸一口** 让法官滚蛋吧
[00:37.64]
[00:38.30]坐在飞驰的劳斯莱斯幻影里 竖起中指 伸出窗外 《Makaveli》在我身边响起
[00:41.63]还有《Hail Mary》 我是**仙子
[00:43.44]
[00:43.95]事情不可能永远一帆风顺 所以我们一直准备着保释金
[00:46.88]
[00:47.87]你打算怎么回应
[00:48.88]
[00:50.25]我可以让钞票和蠢蛋说话
[00:52.09]
[00:53.18]我可以让珠宝和手表说话
[00:54.98]
[00:55.80]我的手表亮晶晶 没有保险盒可不行
[00:58.51]
[00:59.24]你身上穿着香奈儿
[01:00.10]
[01:00.86]我的座驾是三十二万刀的法拉利 车篷想开就开 想关就关
[01:03.29]
[01:03.83]公路谋杀案的新闻早上六点播出来
[01:06.70]懂了吧 我用自己的方式走向成功 这是铁一般的事实
[01:09.29]
[01:10.08]我的那些货 质量好得很 隔着特百惠的保鲜盒都能闻到
[01:12.81]
[01:13.33]两包变成四包 就像赌注加倍的大冒险
[01:15.67]
[01:16.41]我就是**制造之王
[01:18.82]你可以解开整个谜团
[01:20.28]
[01:21.14]他们在说你坏话 你打算怎么回应
[01:23.65]//
[01:24.54]//
[01:25.81]
[01:27.38]//
[01:29.31]
[01:30.24]我是不是太世故了 不适合ComplexCom
[01:32.22]
[01:33.15]不管我说什么 都会引起争论
[01:35.37]
[01:35.88]你看 他过时了 他与时代格格不入
[01:38.11]
[01:38.68]他家的走廊太长了 太不合适了
[01:41.23]
[01:41.76]他找了代理人 他的孩子有两个爹
[01:44.05]
[01:44.73]我一直在想 2Pac会怎么做
[01:47.00]
[01:47.63]而你一直在想 新街边男孩会怎么做
[01:50.31]如果你不是黑人 你的车还会被警察拦住吗
[01:53.16]我戴一顶MAGA帽子是不是就可以安然开过去
[01:55.67]
[01:56.44]我老弟瑞吉给我的电话还在耳边回响
[01:58.24]
[01:59.28]天堂多了一个天使 名叫艾弗里
[02:01.28]
[02:02.20]你最好小心你称之为疯子的人
[02:04.25]
[02:05.00]Yeezy 那可是市值亿元的品牌
[02:07.30]不像菲尔·奈特一样成功 我是不会松懈的
[02:10.17]我的目标是专辑销量六个零 就像菲尔·杰克逊承诺乔丹的那样
[02:13.02]每天晚上七片药 你知道那种感觉的
[02:15.77]我不会再掩饰伤疤 我会像席尔一样揭开伤疤 行吧
[02:18.44]
[02:20.47]你打算怎么回应
